name: Escape From Zombie Road
description:
You will face countless zombies in the streets of no man's zone. The road looks very long and it is difficult to live, but don't give up please. Although you only have 3 bullets, they are all special ammunition that can bounce 6 times. Use this powerful feature and take your wisdom and courage to defeat all kinds of zombies.

Game Features:
- Rely on the physics of bullets to kill zombies.
- Different zombies need to use different strategies.
- Clever use of street structure to get rid of enemies.
- When you defeat a large zombie, you will gain a random attribute that make your warrior stronger.
- Your heroic battle will be recorded and scored with friends.

Although isolated and helpless, don't be afraid, believe in yourself, you are the strongest warrior!
